text: Appapillai Amirthalingam (, 26 August 1927 â€“ 13 July 1989) was a Sri Lankan Tamil politician. He was a Member of Parliament and Leader of the Opposition. Amirthalingam was assassinated by the Tamil Tigers. Category:1927 births Category:1989 deaths Category:Sri Lankan lawyers Category:Assassinated Sri Lankan politicians
